products.name: Royale Monogram Handbag
products.material: Premium coated canvas with leather trim
products.description: A structured silhouette with refined hardware and a royal finish — built for evening arrivals and everyday prestige.

products.name: Heritage Trunk Bag
products.description: Inspired by classic travel trunks. Precise edges, rich leather, and a lock detail for unmistakable presence.

products.name: Glamour Croco Handbag
products.description: A bold statement of luxury with rich texture and a vibrant emerald hue.

products.name: Crest Buckle Belt
products.description: A clean strap paired with a sculpted crest buckle — understated luxury with a sharp finish.

products.name: Golden Signature Belt
products.description: Gold hardware meets soft tan suede for a sophisticated, versatile accessory.

products.name: Murgdur Oud Intense
products.description: A deep, warm accord of oud and amber with a refined floral lift — bold, clean, and unforgettable.

products.name: Noir Night Parfum
products.description: An intense, mysterious fragrance designed for the evening hours.

products.name: Regal Chronograph
products.description: Precision timekeeping with a royal palette — for a statement that never shouts.

products.name: Heritage Silver Watch
products.description: A classic design that honors the heritage of fine watchmaking.

products.name: Royal Slim Wallet
products.description: Minimal profile, maximum refinement — crafted for everyday carry with a luxury finish.

products.name: Executive Bifold
products.description: Spacious and elegant, perfect for the modern executive.

products.name: Atelier T-Shirt
products.description: A clean luxury basic with elevated fabric weight and perfect drape — designed for sharp silhouettes.

products.name: Gold Crest Tee
products.description: Featuring the iconic Murgdur gold crest.

products.name: Tailored Trouser
products.description: A precise taper and structured waist — made for formal ease and premium comfort.

products.name: Slim Fit Chino
products.description: Perfect for a smart-casual luxury look.

products.name: Royal Overcoat
products.description: A commanding long-line overcoat with a clean collar and premium finish — for cold-weather elegance.

products.name: Classic Camel Coat
products.description: The peak of winter luxury, as seen on our main editorial.

products.name: Oversized Hoodie
products.description: Luxurious softness, oversized drape — elevated streetwear built to feel royal.

products.name: Royal Box Tee
products.description: A modern, relaxed silhouette with a boxy fit.

products.name: Crest Cap
products.description: A structured cap with crest detailing — minimal, bold, and unmistakably premium.

products.name: Crest Sweat Shirt
products.description: A luxury essential with superior hand-feel — clean fit, sharp cuffs, and royal confidence.

products.name: Grand Voyager Tote
products.description: Spacious enough for a weekend getaway, elegant enough for the city. Defined by robust handles and our signature weave.

products.name: Soirée Mini Clutch
products.description: A jewel of a bag. Compact, glittering, and finished with a detachable gold chain.

products.name: Artisan Braided Belt
products.description: Hand-woven leather offering a relaxed yet sophisticated texture.

products.name: Onyx Dress Belt
products.description: High-shine leather with a minimal silver buckle. The definitive formal belt.

products.name: Royal Rose Absolu
products.description: A modern interpretation of classic rose, deepened with spice and dark woods.

products.name: Amalfi Bergamot
products.description: Bright, crisp Italian citrus notes grounded by a hint of cedar. Pure summer elegance.

products.name: Grand Tourer Sport
products.description: Lightweight, durable titanium construction for the gentleman racer.

products.name: Imperial Gold Dress
products.description: Minimalist dial, maximist impact. A dress watch that commands the room.

products.name: Continental Zip Wallet
products.description: Full zip closure for security, with ample space for global currencies.

products.name: Minimalist Card Holder
products.description: For those who travel light. Holds just the essentials in a sleek profile.

products.name: Monogram Pocket Tee
products.description: Subtle luxury with our embroidered monogram on the pocket.

products.name: Midnight Mercerized Tee
products.description: A subtle sheen and silky hand-feel defined this elevated essential.

products.name: Pleated Gurkha Trouser
products.description: High-waisted with a double buckle waistband. Sartorial elegance for warmer days.

products.name: Luxe Jogger Trouser
products.description: The comfort of joggers with the cut of trousers. Perfect for the modern nomad.

products.name: Naval Peacoat
products.description: Double-breasted heritage design. Substantial, warm, and endlessly stylish.

products.name: Belted Storm Trench
products.description: Designed for the elements. Features a structured silhouette and storm flap.

products.name: Boxy Crewneck
products.description: Dropped shoulders and a wide fit for that perfect contemporary silhouette.

products.name: Oversized Denim Shirt
products.description: Relaxed fit denim shirting reminiscent of 90s luxury streetwear.

products.name: Performance Tech Cap
products.description: Sleek, breathable, and water-resistant. Crafted for active lifestyles.

products.name: Heritage Wool Cap
products.description: A warmer take on the classic baseball cap, featuring a wool texture.

products.name: Embossed Logo Sweat
products.description: Tonal embossed branding for a subtle yet premium statement.

products.name: Quarter-Zip Luxe Pullover
products.description: Elevated sportswear. The quarter-zip detail adds versatility and style.
